title: Rename the website to "yor txt"

requirements.text: Update the app/website name to "yor txt" everywhere it appears in the UI, including the top-left brand text in the header and the copyright line in the footer.

quotes: The website name is yor txt

acceptanceCriteria: The header brand label displays "yor txt" on all pages.
The footer copyright line displays "Â© <current year> yor txt. All rights reserved."
No remaining user-visible instances of the old app name (e.g., "Story Share") appear in the rendered UI.

requirements.text: Update the HTML document title (the <title> tag in frontend/index.html) to use "yor txt".

quotes: The website name is yor txt

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab title contains "yor txt".
The previous title text is no longer present in frontend/index.html.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Changing authentication, story creation, or backend behavior.
Adding new pages or features beyond renaming the site/app.
